title: Chicken Little (2005 film)
summary: Chicken Little is a 2005 American computer-animated comedy film produced by Walt Disney Feature Animation and loosely based on the "Henny Penny" Anglo-Saxon fairy tale. The 46th Disney animated feature film, it was directed by Mark Dindal from a screenplay by Steve Bencich, Ron J. Friedman, and Ron Anderson, based on a story by Mark Kennedy and Dindal. In this version, the title character is ridiculed by his town of Oakey Oaks for causing a panic a year ago, thinking that the sky was falling. But one day, when the town is attacked by aliens, Chicken Little and his friends, Abby Mallard, Runt of the Litter, and Fish Out of Water must save the world from the invasion. The film is dedicated to Disney artist and writer Joe Grant, who died before the film's release.
